column2: Slaughter their soldiers, take their women and plunder their riches! It is time to raid!
This character is on a viking, out to plunder and pillage for glory, gold and Odin!
This character is a niding, an honorless scoundrel.
A berserker fears nothing, and goes into battle with bloodlust and mushrooms! Sadly, the mushrooms tend to take a mental toll.
Seek out a female practitioner of Seid
